solution_line_template: At this point in the season, Donovan has scored {current_average_points} * {games_played} = <<{current_average_points}*{games_played}={current_total_points}>>{current_total_points} points.

To reach his goal of {goal_average_points} points per game, he would have to finish the season with a total of {goal_average_points} * {total_games_season} = <<{goal_average_points}*{total_games_season}={goal_total_points}>>{goal_total_points} points.

For the remaining 5 games, Donovan needs to score {goal_total_points} - {current_total_points} = <<{goal_total_points}-{current_total_points}={points_needed_remaining_games}>>{points_needed_remaining_games} points.

Therefore, he needs to average {points_needed_remaining_games} / {remaining_games} = <<{points_needed_remaining_games}/{remaining_games}={average_points_needed}>>{average_points_needed} points per game.
